content.new:
Hello my name is Matt Bowers. I realized that in the tutorial below that there is no instruction to properly source where the .xacro is coming from . In my case it is coming from a bash file so I sourced that. The link to the page with the issue is below. Thanks for your time!

#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/AddingSensors
